div.p: NCPDP standard product billing codes of NCPDP field Unit of Measure (600-28). This billing code is assigned per product, placed in the Structured Product Label, and used in the pharmacy billing processing for consistent billing unit.

valueString.value: National Council for Prescription Drug Programs (NCPDP),National Council for Prescription Drug Progr

name.value: National Council for Prescription Drug Programs (NCPDP),National Council for Prescription Drug Progr
